title: Two more Sri Lankan players sold at IPL Auction
content: Sri Lankan cricketers Chamika Karunaratne and Bhanuka Rajapaksa have also been sold to franchises at the 2022 Indian Premier League (IPL) Auction.The fast-bowling allrounder Chamika Karunaratne has been sold to the Kolkata Knight Riders for INR 50 Lakh.Meanwhile batter Bhanuka Rajapaksa has been sold to Punjab Kings for INR 50 Lakh.
